body:
Your explanation is spot-on, Sarith, and I can confirm that Ladybug is also Windows only at the moment.  The new version of Ladybug in the works ([https://github.com/ladybug-analysis-tools](https://github.com/ladybug-analysis-tools)) should also be cross-platform.



Thank you for taking it for a test drive, Aaron.  Just to understand what it would take for us to recreate the interface in Rhino for Mac, were you able to install GHPython and get it to run correctly?



-Chris
